title: Integrate code coverage.  Clover / cobertura
description: Solr needs some sort of code coverage tool for testing.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: dup of SOLR-143? ... or did you have something specific in mind?

comments.author: Ryan McKinley
comments.content:
I just set up cobertura for some other projects so i tried my hand with this one too...   I am defiantly NOT an ant/testing expert, so I don't know if this is a 'standard' setup or not!

I know Apache has a Clover license  so that is probably better, but this works now and does not require anyone to set anything up on their machines.

First pass shows 66% line coverage and 64% branch coverage.
